item.text: @#/ /phal chen nga pa bzhugs so//
shin tu rgyas pa chen po'i mdo/ sangs rgyas phal po che zhes bya ba/ bam
po drug cu rtsa gsum pa/ de nas byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs chen po de'i nang nas /
byang chub sems dpa' kha cig 'di snyam du sems te/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing ni ji tsam zhig tu bsam gyis mi khyab/ sangs rgyas
bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sngon gyi smon lam dang / 'byung ba rnam par dag pa ni ji
tsam zhig tu bsam gyis mi khyab/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i
gdung ni ji tsam zhig tu bsam gyis mi khyab/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi
skye ba ni ji tsam zhig tu bsam gyis mi khyab/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi de bzhin
gshegs pa'i sku ni ji tsam zhig tu bsam gyis mi khyab/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi de
bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung ni ji tsam zhig tu bsam gyis mi khyab/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i
ye shes ni ji tsam zhig tu bsam gyis mi khyab/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i rnam par 'phrul pa ni
ji tsam zhig tu bsam gyis mi khyab/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi chags pa mi mnga' ba'i rnam par spyod pa ni ji tsam zhig tu
bsam gyis mi khyab/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi rnam par thar pa ni ji tsam zhig tu bsam gyis mi khyab
snyam pa dang / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' de dag gi sems thugs kyis thugs su chud nas/ byang chub
sems dpa' ut+pa la'i snying po/ sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis byin du brlabs so/ /sangs rgyas kyi ye shes kyi byin dang ldan
par mdzad do/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'od kyis snang bar mdzad do/ /sangs rgyas kyi gzi brjid kyis yongs
su rgyas par mdzad do/ /sangs rgyas kyi mi 'jigs pa la rab tu bzhag go /sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi dbyings la 'jug pa khong du chud
par mdzad do/ /sangs rgyas kyi bdag nyid che ba nyid dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi yul rab tu rtogs par mdzad do/ /chags pa med pa'i rgyud
'byams klas pa la rab tu bzhag go /sangs rgyas thams cad gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa'i rigs rab tu rtogs par mdzad do/ /
sangs rgyas kyi tshul gyi gnas brjod du med pa la rab tu bzhag pa mdzad do/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' ut+pa la'i snying pos
chos kyi dbyings la 'jug pa rig cing khong du chud pas/ chags pa med pa'i dbyings su bsgrubs pa'i yid dang / chos thams
cad la bsgribs pa med par gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa dang / kun tu bzang po'i smon lam dang ldan pa'i yang dag par 'jug pa dang / sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rjes su
song ba'i sangs rgyas blta ba dang / snying rje chen pos lta ba'i sems can thams cad yongs su sbyong ba'i go cha chen po dang / byang chub sems dpa'i yi dam dang / spyod pa'i dkyil 'khor
rgyun chad pa med pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi ye shes mngon par sgrub pa skad cig gi cha shas la rnam par spyod pa dang / thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sgo mthong ba mi zad pa dang / tha dad
pa yang dag par shes pa'i rnam pa/ gzungs thams cad kyis snang bar byas pa dang ldan pas sangs rgyas kyi mthus byang chub sems dpa' pad+mo'i snying po la 'di skad ces smras so/ /
kye rgyal ba'i sras/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni tshad med pa la rnam par spyod pa ste/ kye rgyal ba'i sras/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni rnam par 'phrul pa
chen po la rnam par spyod pa'o/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa thams cad la sku'i mtshan nyid thams cad rab tu brnyes pa'o/ /
sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba ni ting nge 'dzin dang dgongs pas sbyar ba'o/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi tha dad pa yang dag par
mkhyen pa bzhi ni brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa shin tu ston pa'o/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni/ sangs rgyas kyi chos thams
cad la bsam gyis mi khyab par rnam par spyod pa'o/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi gsung dang dbyangs ni tshad med pa'o/ /sangs
rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi chos kyi dbyings thugs su chud pa ni brjod du med pa'o/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi khyu mchog gi mthu phyung ba ni/
thams cad mngon par mkhyen pa'o/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras dag/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis chos kyi dbyings thugs su chud cing bstan pa ni bsgribs pa med pa'i
mthar thug pa'o/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras/ bcu po 'di dag ni/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi chos kyi dbyings mtha' dang dbus med pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos rnam pa bcu
ste| bcu gang zhe na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi gzugs kyi sku rnam par dag pa ni rnyog pa med par rgyud thams cad du byung bas mtha' dang dbus med pa'o//
sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi chags pa med pa'i spyan ni/ chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid kyi spyan mngon par sangs rgyas pas mtha' dang dbus med pa'o/ /
sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi chags pa med pa'i snyan ni/ 'gro ba thams cad kyi sgra bsgribs pa med par thugs su chud pas mtha' dang dbus med pa'o/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan
'das rnams kyi shangs kyi skye mched ni/ sangs rgyas kyi mnga' thams cad kyi pha rol tu phyin pa brnyes pas mtha' dang dbus med pa'o/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi ljags
shin tu yangs pa ni/ chos kyi dbyings thams cad du gsung gi dbyangs rjes su 'gro bas mtha' dang dbus med pa'o/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sku'i chos nyid ni/ sems
can thams cad ma lus pa'i sems kyi rnam pa la de bzhin gshegs pa mthong ba rnam par dmigs pas mtha' dang dbus med pa'o/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi thugs kyi 'phrin
las ni/ chos kyi sku dang tha mi dad cing / dus gsum chags pa med par thugs su chud cing rnam par dag pas mtha' dang dbus med pa'o/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sangs
rgyas kyi rnam par thar pa bsgribs pa mi mnga' ba la rnam par spyod pa ni/ sangs rgyas kyi go 'phang dang / rnam par 'phrul ba dang / cho 'phrul mi zad pa yang dag par ston pas mtha'
dang dbus med pa'o/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad rnam par dag pa ni/ brjod du med pa'i rgyan byin gyis brlabs pas/ sangs rgyas kyi
zhing nye bar nyon mongs pa med pa yang dag par bstan te/ bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du rnam par dmigs par mdzad pas mtha' dang dbus med pa'o/ /
sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa'i khyad par dang / smon lam thams cad yongs su rdzogs pa ni/ rnam par rol ba'i ye shes kyi chos yongs
su rdzogs te/ chos thams cad rdzogs par byang chub par bya ba la mtha' dang dbus med pa ste/ kye rgyal ba'i sras/ bcu po 'di dag ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang
dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi chos kyi dbyings mtha' dang dbus med pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams so/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras/ bcu po 'di dag ni/ sangs rgyas
bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi skad cig gcig la ye shes kyis mngon par bsgrubs pa yang dag par bstan pa'o/ /bcu gang zhe na/ skad cig gcig la 'jig rten
gyi khams thams cad du dga' ldan gyi gnas nas 'pho ba yongs su bstan pa dang / skad cig gcig la 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du byang chub sems dpa'i tshe yongs su
bstan pa dang / skad cig gcig la 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du mngon par 'byung ba yongs su bstan pa dang / skad cig gcig la 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du byang
chub kyi shing drung du bzhugs shing mngon par 'tshang rgya ba yongs su bstan pa dang / skad cig gcig la 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba yongs su bstan pa dang / skad
cig gcig la 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du 'dul ba'i sems can yongs su smin pa'i tshul ji lta ba bzhin du dus la bab par shes pas sangs rgyas bsnyen bkur ba yongs su bstan pa
dang | skad cig gcig la 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du sems can ji ltar 'dul ba'i tshul bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa brjod du med pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi sku sna tshogs rnam
par dmigs pa yongs su bstan pa dang / skad cig gcig la 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du rgyan sna tshogs dang / rgyan brjod du med pas de bzhin gshegs pa'i khyu mchog gi mthu
phyung ba dang / thams cad mkhyen pa'i mdzod yongs su bstan pa dang / skad cig gcig la 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du rnam par dag pa gcig ma yin pa thams cad yongs su
bstan pa dang / skad cig gcig la 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du 'das pa dang / ma byon pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas skye ba thams cad du dbang po dang / brtson 'grus
rnam pa tha dad pa byung ba dang / mos pa dang / spyod pa rnam pa tha dad pa byung ba la dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas kyi rgyud du mngon par 'tshang rgya ba yongs su bstan pa ste/ kye rgyal ba'i sras/
bcu po de dag ni/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi skad cig la ye shes mngon par sgrub pa yang dag par bstan pa'o/ /kye rgyal
ba'i sras/ bcu po 'di dag ni/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi dus las mi 'da' ba ste/ bcu gang zhe na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis mngon
par 'tshang rgya ba ni/ de'i dus las mi 'da' bas dus la bab pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi dge ba rnam par smin pa dang / rnam par ma smin pa mnyam pa nyid ni/
de'i dus las mi 'da' bas dus la bab pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis yongs su smin pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams lung bstan pa ni/ de'i dus las
mi 'da' bas dus la bab pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis sems can gyi bsam pa'i rgyud du cho 'phrul yongs su bstan pa ni/ de'i dus las mi 'da'
bas dus la bab pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis sems can mos pa ji lta bu dang ldan pa'i tshul bzhin du sku yongs su bstan pa ni/ de'i dus las mi
'da' bas dus la bab pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams btang snyoms su bzhugs pa ni/ de'i dus las mi 'da' bas dus la bab pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom
ldan 'das rnams yul dang grong dang grong rdal du gshegs pa ni/ de'i dus la mi 'da' bas dus la bab pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dad pa ji lta bu dang ldan pa'i
tshul bzhin du sems can yongs su 'dzin pa ni/ de'i dus las mi 'da' bas dus la bab pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams sems can kun nas nyon mongs pa dang ldan
zhing gdul dka' ba la gzhan la ltos pa mi mnga' bar 'dul ba ni/ de'i dus las mi 'da' bas dus la bab pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi rnam
par 'phrul pa bsam gyis mi khyab pas rnam par 'phrul pa bstan pa ni/ de'i dus las mi 'da' bas dus la bab pa yin/ kye rgyal ba'i sras/ bcu po de dag ni/ sangs rgyas bcom
ldan 'das rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi dus las mi 'da' ba'o/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras/ bcu po 'di dag ni/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi yul dpe med cing bsam
gyis mi khyab pa ste/ bcu gang zhe na/ 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad ma lus par skyil mo krung gcig gis rgyas par dgang ba dang / dus gcig tu sangs rgyas thams cad yongs su
bstan pa dang / 'od zer gcig gis 'jig rten gyi khams ma lus pa thams cad snang bar bya ba dang / sku gzugs gcig gis lus dang / gzugs thams cad yongs su bstan pa
dang | gnas gcig na bzhugs kyang 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad ma lus par byon pa'i skur 'gyur ba dang / ye shes gcig rtogs pas chos thams
cad la bsgribs pa med par 'gyur ba dang / thugs gcig bskyed pas chos kyi dbyings thams cad ma lus par rgyas par 'gengs pa dang / sangs rgyas kye che ba nyid tshad med pa dang
ldan pa'i gshegs stabs gcig gis de kho na nyid yang dag par bstan pa dang / dus gsum thams cad sangs rgyas kyi go 'phang gis rgyas par 'gengs pa dang / 'gro ba thams
cad dang ma 'dres par bzhugs shing / 'das pa dang / ma byon pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rgyud kyi tshul gcig pa
ste| kye rgyal ba'i sras/ bcu po de dag ni/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi yul dpe med cing bsam gyis mi khyab pa'o/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras/ bcu po 'di
dag ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi byin gyis brlabs mngon par sgrub pa'i ye shes te/ bcu gang zhe na/ 'jug pa med pa'i chos thams cad la 'jug pas smon
lam mngon par sgrub pa'i ye shes dang / lus med pa la lus mngon par sgrub pa'i ye shes dang / chos thams cad mi gnyis pa la mngon par 'tshang rgya ba mngon par sgrub pa'i ye
shes dang / sems can gyi mthar thug par bdag med pa la sems can 'dul ba mngon par sgrub pa'i ye shes dang / chos thams cad mtshan ma med pa la mtshan ma sna tshogs mngon par
sgrub pa'i ye shes dang / 'jig rten gyi khams kyi yul ma skyes pa la 'jig rten gyi khams 'du ba dang / 'jig pa mngon par sgrub pa'i ye shes dang / yul thams cad mngon par 'du bya
ba med pa la las kyi rnam par smin pa mngon par sgrub pa'i ye shes dang / chos thams cad brjod du med pa la chos kyi dbyings su gsung mngon par sgrub pa'i ye shes dang / chos thams
cad kun nas nyon mongs pa dang / rnam par byang bas 'jug pa med pa la kun nas nyon mongs pa dang / rnam par byang ba mngon par sgrub pa'i ye shes dang / chos thams cad ma skyes pa la
skye ba dang / 'jig pa'i mtshan nyid rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba mngon par sgrub pa'i ye shes te/ kye rgyal ba'i sras/ bcu po de dag ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi sangs rgyas
kyi mngon par sgrub pa'i ye shes so/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras/ bcu po 'di dag ni/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi tshad med pa'i khongs su chud pa dag ste/ bcu gang zhe na/ sangs
rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sku ni/ dus gsum thams cad kyi rjes su 'brang ba'i khongs su chud pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams sems can thams cad 'dul
bar mdzad pa ni/ cho 'phrul chen po gsum gyi khongs su chud pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams tshig rab tu dbye ba thams cad la mkhas pa ni/
sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi gzungs thams cad kyi khongs su chud pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi chos kyi 'khor lo thams cad ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i tha dad pa yang
dag par mkhyen pa bzhir khongs su chud pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams sems can thams cad yongs su mi gtong ba ni/ thugs rje chen po'i khongs su chud pa yin/ sangs
rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams rtag tu mnyam par bzhag pa ni/ dus thams cad du sems can thams cad la rnam par gzigs pa'i khongs su chud pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan
'das rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba ni/ sems can rnam par gdul ba thams cad khongs su chud pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi chags pa mi mnga' bar
spyod pa ni/ chos kyi dbyings thams cad khongs su chud pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi skad cig gcig tu ni/ 'das pa dang / ma byon pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i sangs
rgyas skye ba thams cad khongs su chud pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi nyi ma gcig tu ni/ dus gsum gyi bskal pa'i grangs khong du chud par bstan pa thams cad khongs
su chud pa yin/ kye rgyal ba'i sras/ bcu po de dag ni/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi tshad med pa'i khongs su chud pa'o/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras/ bcu po 'di dag ni/ sangs rgyas bcom
ldan 'das rnams kyi shin tu rgya che ba'i chos bzod par dka' ba rnams te/ bcu gang zhe na/ bdud kyi dkrugs ma rab tu 'joms zhing rnam par 'thor ba ni/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
rnams kyi shin tu rgya che ba'i chos bzod par dka' ba'o/ /mu stegs can gzhan dang / phas kyi rgol ba tshar bcad pa ni/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi shin tu rgya che ba'i chos
bzod par dka' ba'o/ /'dul ba'i sems can thams cad rab tu tshim par mdzad pa ni/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi shin tu rgya che ba'i chos bzod par dka' ba'o/ /
sems can 'dul ba'i dbang gis 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du gshegs pa ni/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi shin tu rgya che ba'i chos bzod par dka' ba'o/ /
chos kyi dbyings thugs su chud pa'i ye shes ni/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi shin tu rgya che ba'i chos bzod par dka' ba'o/ /'jig rten gyi khams thams cad ma
lus par skus khyab cing / sangs rgyas kyi sku rnam par phye ba sna tshogs thams cad du mi gnyis pa ni/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi shin tu rgya che ba'i chos bzod
par dka' ba'o/ /gsung gi yan lag thams cad la sems can mos par bya ba dang / thos par bya ba dang / gdul bar bya ba don yod par tha dad pa yang dag par
mkhyen pa thogs pa med pas bstan pa'i tshul du tha dad pa yang dag par mkhyen pa bzhi 'byung ba ni/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi shin tu rgya che ba'i chos bzod par dka' ba'o//
sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi ba spu'i bu ga gcig nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed bsam gyis mi khyab cing thogs pa
med pa'i tshul du 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi thabs kyis 'byung zhing / de bzhin du sangs rgyas kyis sku'i ba spu'i bu ga thams cad nas 'byung ba ni/
sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi shin tu rgya che ba'i chos bzod par dka' ba'o/ /de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rdul shin tu phra ba
gcig la sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed yongs su ston cing / sangs rgyas kyi rgyan dang / rang bzhin gyi lhab lhub dang / chos kyi 'khor
lo bskor ba rgyun mi 'chad cing / sems can rnam par 'dul ba thogs pa med pa la 'jig rten gyi khams de dag tu gtogs pa rnams la'ang mi bde ba dang / gnod pa med kyang rdul
shin tu phra ba de yang yangs par ma byas/ 'jig rten gyi khams de dag kyang chung bar ma byas par ji ltar gnas pa'i chos kyi dbyings kyang thugs su chud pa'i ye shes mnga' ba ni/ sangs rgyas
bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi shin tu rgya che ba'i chos bzod par dka' ba'o/ /mun pa med pa'i khams de bzhin gshegs pas mngon par sangs rgyas te/ sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad la
mun pa med cing bsgribs pa mi mnga' la/ sems can pha rol gyi bsgribs pa sna tshogs kyi gnas rnam par sel na/ de la de bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang ldan
pa ni| sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi shin tu rgya che ba'i chos la bzod par dka' ba ste/ kye rgyal ba'i sras/ bcu po de dag ni/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi shin
tu rgya che ba'i chos bzod par dka' ba'o/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras dag/ bcu po 'di dag ni/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi bdag nyid che ba rnam pa thams cad du kha na ma tho ba med cing
shin tu dag pa ste/ bcu gang zhe na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi yang dag par bsgrubs pa bdag nyid che ba ni/ sngon gyi mtha' nas rnam pa thams cad du kha na ma tho ba med
cing rnam par dag pa'o/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi 'das pa dang / ma byon pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas kyi rgyud du rigs dang ldan par 'byung ba'i bdag nyid che
ba ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs rnam par dag pas/ rnam pa thams cad du kha na ma tho ba med cing shin tu rnam par dag pa'o/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan
'das rnams ni rnam par shes pa la mi gnas pa ste/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi bdag nyid che ba ni/ phyi ma'i mtha'i mur thug par gnas pas/ rnam pa thams cad du kha
na ma tho ba med cing shin tu rnam par dag pa'o/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni dus gsum la mi gnas par rnam par spyod cing chos thams cad la rten pa yang dag par bcom
pas| sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi bdag nyid che ba ni/ rnam pa thams cad du kha na ma tho ba med cing shin tu rnam par dag pa'o/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni
dngos po rnam pa tha dad pa la rnam par gzhag pa gcig gis len pa med pas/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi bdag nyid che ba ni/ rnam pa thams cad du kha na ma tho ba med
cing shin tu rnam par dag pa'o/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni sngon gyi mtha' dang / phyi ma'i mthar chos kyi dbyings la gnas pas mnyam pa'i bsod nams mi zad pa
dang ldan pas/ mi zad pa'i bsod nams mnga' ba ste/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi bdag nyid che ba ni/ rnam pa thams cad du kha na ma tho ba med cing shin tu rnam par
dag pa'o/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni sku gzugs dang / kha dog mtha' yas pas 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad na sems can 'dul ba'i dus dang dbang gis chags
pa med par bzhugs pas/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi bdag nyid che ba ni/ rnam pa thams cad du kha na ma tho ba med cing shin tu rnam par dag pa'o/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan
'das rnams ni mi 'jigs pa bzhi brnyes pas bag tsha ba mi mnga' bar bzhugs shing khyu mchog dang / seng ge'i nga ro 'byin te/ rgol ba'i nang na stag lta bu'i mthu dang ldan la/ chos
thams cad bstan pa la thugs sgron ma lta bu mnga' bas/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi bdag nyid che ba ni/ rnam pa thams cad du kha na ma tho ba med cing shin tu rnam par dag
pa'o| |sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni yongs su mya ngan las 'das nas bskal pa brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa zhig lon yang mtshan gyi tshig thos pa tsam gyis bzhugs
pa dang 'dra bar sems can rnams kyi yon shin tu sbyong zhing / mya ngan las 'das nas de srid kyi yun ring po 'das kyang / sangs rgyas la bskyed pa'i yon tan zad par mi 'gyur bas/
sangs rgyas kyi bdag nyid che ba ni/ rnam pa thams cad du kha na ma tho ba med cing shin tu rnam par dag pa'o/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni 'jig rten gyi khams brjod du med pa'i
yang brjod du med pa dag na bzhugs shing / 'jig rten gyi khams rgyang ring po na bzhugs kyang / 'jig rten gyi khams 'di na gnas pa'i sems can rnams
kyis rjes su dran par byas na/ sku mngon par ston pa mdzad pas/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi bdag nyid che ba ni/ rnam pa thams cad du kha na ma tho ba med cing shin tu rnam par
dag pa ste/ kye rgyal ba'i sras/ bcu po de dag ni/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi bdag nyid che ba ni/ rnam pa thams cad du kha na ma tho ba med cing shin tu rnam par dag pa'o/ /
kye rgyal ba'i sras dag /bcu po 'di dag ni/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi shin tu rnam par dag pa ste/ bcu gang zhe na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni sangs rgyas
kyi tshangs pa'i spyod pa rnam par dag pa la/ sngon gyi smon lam gyis shin tu rnam par dag pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni chags pa med pa'i tshul khrims kyis
shin tu rnam par dag pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni/ sems can thams cad kyi nyon mongs pa sel bas shin tu rnam par dag pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom
ldan 'das rnams ni/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing gis shin tu rnam par dag pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni 'khor gyis shin tu rnam par dag pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom
ldan 'das rnams ni rigs rnam par dag pas shin tu rnam par dag pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni/ gzugs kyi sku'i mtshan dang dpe byad bzang po rnam par dag pas shin tu
rnam par dag pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni/ chos kyi sku rnyog pa med pas shin tu rnam par dag pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni/ thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye
shes kyi phung po bsgribs pa med pas shin tu rnam par dag pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni/ sangs rgyas kyi rnam par thar pa thams cad la mthu chen po brnyes shing / pha rol tu
phyin pa dam pa brnyes pas shin tu rnam par dag pa yin te/ kye rgyal ba'i sras/ bcu po de dag ni/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi shin tu rnam par dag pa'o/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras dag/
bcu po 'di dag ni/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi mdzad pa 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du 'byung zhing dus thams cad du gnas pa ste/ bcu gang zhe na/ sangs rgyas rjes su dran
pa thob pa'i sems can rnams la dus thams cad du sangs rgyas bstan pa dang / sems can sems cad shes dang ldan pa rnams la dus thams cad du chos bstan pa dang / sems can
sangs rgyas la dad pa'i sems dang ldan pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba dus thams cad du bskyed pa dang / chos skyon med par 'das pa'i sems can rnams dus thams cad du ye shes khong du chud par
bya ba dang / 'gro ba thams cad du sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa dus thams cad du rgyun mi 'chad pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa rnams 'jig rten gyi khams thams
cad du dus thams cad du chags pa mi mnga' bar gshegs pa dang / sems can thams cad la thugs rje chen po dus thams cad du mi gtong ba dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi sprul pa dus thams cad du thogs pa med pa dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi rnam par 'phrul pa sna tshogs dus thams cad du thogs
pa med pa dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams chos kyi dbyings gnas pa'i sangs rgyas dus thams cad du 'byung ba ste/ kye rgyal ba'i sras/ bcu po de dag ni/ sangs rgyas bcom
ldan 'das rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du 'byung zhing / dus thams cad du gnas pa'o/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras/ bcu po 'di dag ni/ de bzhin
gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi ye shes rgya mtsho mi zad pa'i tshul rnams te/ bcu gang zhe na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni
de bzhin gshegs pa'i skus ye shes rgya mtsho mi zad pa'o/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni/ sangs rgyas kyi 'phrin las tshad med pa brnyes pas ye shes rgya mtsho mi zad
pa'o| |sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyi yul mnga' bas ye shes rgya mtsho mi zad pa'o/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni dge ba'i rtsa ba tshad med pa bsam gyis
mi khyab pa mnga' bas ye shes rgya mtsho mi zad pa'o/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni chos kyi tshar mngon par 'bebs pas ye shes rgya mtsho mi zad pa'o/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
rnams ni sangs rgyas kyi yon tan dang / legs pa mang po mnga' bas ye shes rgya mtsho mi zad pa'o/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni sngon gyi mtha'i thams cad mkhyen pa'i smon lam
dang khyad par mnga' bas ye shes rgya mtsho mi zad pa'o/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni phyi ma'i mtha'i mur 'gro ba thams cad sangs rgyas kyi 'phrin las rgyun mi 'chad par bsgrub pas
ye shes rgya mtsho mi zad pa'o/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni sems can gyi rigs thams cad ma lus pa'i sems dang spyod pa la ye shes rgya mtsho mi zad pa'o/ /sangs rgyas
bcom ldan 'das rnams ni thams cad mkhyen pa'i bsod nams zil gyis mi non pas ye shes rgya mtsho mi zad pa'o/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras/ bcu po de dag ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra
bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi ye shes rgya mtsho mi zad pa'o/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras/ bcu po 'di dag ni/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi
tshul rnams te/ bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad kyis mngon par byung ba 'di ni/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi tshul yin
no| |'di lta ste/ chos thams cad la mi mkhyen pa gang yang mi mnga' ba 'di ni/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi tshul yin no/ /'di lta ste/ thams cad kyang thugs rje chen po dang
ldan pa 'di ni/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi tshul yin no/ /'di lta ste/ thams cad kyang stobs bcu tshad med pa dang ldan pa 'di ni/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
rnams kyi tshul yin no/ /'di lta ste/ thams cad kyang bla na med pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu bskor ba 'di ni/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi tshul yin no/ /'di lta ste/
thams cad kyang sems can 'dul ba yang dag par zhugs pa 'di ni/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi tshul yin no/ /'di lta ste/ thams cad kyang 'gro ba thams cad
kyi don du mngon par sangs rgyas pa 'di ni/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi tshul yin no/ /'di lta ste/ 'dul ba'i sems can rnams 'dul ba la thogs pa mi mnga' ba
'di ni/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi tshul yin no/ /'di lta ste/ mi gnyis par yang dag par spyod pa'i mtshan nyid kyi chos la rab tu gzhol ba 'di ni/ sangs rgyas
bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi tshul yin no/ /'di lta ste/ ji ltar yongs su smin par gyur pa dang / dul bar gyur pa'i sems can rnams la sangs rgyas kyi yul mu med pas/ sangs rgyas kyi yongs su
mya ngan las 'da' ba ston pa 'di ni/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi tshul yin te/ kye rgyal ba'i sras/ bcu po de dag ni/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi tshul
lo| |kye rgyal ba'i sras/ bcu po 'di dag ni/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi chos mtha' yas pa shin tu bstan pa'i sgo rnams te/ bcu gang zhe na/ sangs rgyas bcom
ldan 'das rnams ni sems can gyi khams shin tu bstan pa'i sgor mtha' yas pa'o/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni sems can gyi spyod pa sna tshogs shin tu bstan pa'i sgor mtha'
yas pa'o/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni sems can thams cad kyi las dang / rnam par smin pa shin tu bstan pa'i sgor mtha' yas pa'o/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams
ni sems can thams cad la gdams ngag dang / man ngag shin tu bstan pa'i sgor mtha' yas pa'o/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni sems can mtha' yas pa rnam par sbyong
ba'i nan tan gyi sgor mtha' yas pa'o/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa thams cad la gdams ngag dang / man ngag gis yongs su gzhog pa'i sgor
mtha' yas pa'o/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni byang chub sems dpa'i khyad par gyi smon lam rnam pa tha dad pas 'byung ba shin tu bstan pa'i sgor
mtha' yas pa'o/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad ma lus pa'i 'du ba dang / 'jig pa shin tu bstan pa'i sgor mtha' yas pa'o/ /sangs rgyas
bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnam par dag pa ni byang chub sems dpa'i bsam pa dang / mos pa ji lta ba bzhin du yongs su bstan pa'i sgor mtha' yas pa'o/ /sangs
rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams ma lus pa thams cad du 'das pa dang / ma byon pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa ni bskal
pa yangs pa de dang de dag tu bstan cing brjod pa dang / yongs su bshad pas sangs rgyas kyi ye shes thams cad khong du chud par bya ba'i sgor mtha' yas pa ste/ kye rgyal ba'i sras/
bcu po de dag ni/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi chos mtha' yas pa shin tu bstan pa'i sgo'o/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras/ bcu po 'di dag ni/ sangs rgyas
bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi 'phrin las sems can rnams la sgrub pa ste/ bcu gang zhe na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sku yongs su bstan pa ni/ sems
can rnams la sangs rgyas kyi 'phrin las sgrub bo/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi gsung yang sems can rnams la sangs rgyas kyi 'phrin las sgrub bo/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
rnams len pa mdzad pa yang sems can rnams la sangs rgyas kyi 'phrin las sgrub bo/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams len pa mi mdzad pa yang sems can rnams la sangs rgyas kyi 'phrin
las sgrub bo/ /sa dang / chu dang / me dang / rlung gis kyang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams sems can rnams la sangs rgyas kyi 'phrin las sgrub bo/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams
ni byin gyi rlabs kyi yul dang mi dmigs pa thams cad yul du mdzad pas kyang / sems can rnams la sangs rgyas kyi 'phrin las sgrub bo/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi mtshan kyang
sems can rnams la sangs rgyas kyi 'phrin las sgrub bo/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni zhing la dmigs par mdzad pas kyang / sems can rnams la sangs rgyas kyi 'phrin las
sgrub bo/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnam par dag pas kyang / sems can rnams la sangs rgyas kyi 'phrin las sgrub bo/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
rnams mi gsung bar bzhugs pa yang sems can rnams la sangs rgyas kyi 'phrin las sgrub pa ste/ kye rgyal ba'i sras/ bcu po de dag ni/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
kyi sangs rgyas kyi 'phrin las sems can rnams la sgrub pa'o// //bam po drug cu rtsa bzhi pa/ kye rgyal ba'i sras/ bcu po 'di dag ni/ sangs rgyas
bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sems can gyi gtso bo'i chos te/ bcu gang zhe na/ smon lam chen po la rab tu brtan zhing smon lam zhig pa mi mnga' bas ji skad du gsung ba de ltar mdzad cing gnyis
su mi gsung ba 'di ni/ sems can gyi gtso bo'i chos dang po'o/ /phyi ma'i mtha'i mur thug pa'i bskal pa thams cad du/ byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la yon tan thams cad yongs su
rdzogs par mdzad par rab tu brtson zhing sgyid lug pa mi mnga' ba 'di ni/ sems can gyi gtso bo'i chos gnyis pa'o/ /sems can 'dul bar 'gyur ba gcig cig gzigs kyang 'jig
rten gyi khams brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med par gshegs shing 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du gshegs pa la thag thogs med pa 'di ni/ sems can gyi gtso bo'i chos
gsum pa'o/ /zhe sdang ba'i sems can rnams la thugs rje chen pos snyoms pa dang / dad pa'i sems can rnams la thugs rje chen pos snyoms pa 'di ni/ sems can gyi gtso
bo'i chos bzhi pa'o/ /gang gi tshe bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang dag par zhugs nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par sangs
rgyas kyi bar du de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas su mi 'gyur ro snyam du byang chub kyi sems ma nyams pa 'di ni/ sems can gyi gtso bo'i chos lnga pa'o/ /
dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad yang dag par sgrub cing thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du yongs su bsngo bas 'jug gi /'jig rten pa'i rgyud la ma yin pa 'di ni/ sems can gyi gtso bo'i chos drug pa'o//

sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rjes su bsngo na/ sangs rgyas kyis spyad pa'i sems su lus kyi las dang / ngag gi las dang / yid kyi las kyis slob cing nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi spyod pas thams cad
mkhyen pa nyid du yongs su bsngo ba med pas/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par sangs rgyas pa 'di ni/ sems can gyi gtso bo'i chos bdun pa'o/ /byang chub sems
dpa'i sems rnam par dag cing / 'od gsal la dwangs pa/ thams cad du snang zhing kun tu 'od 'byung ba/ sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad la snang zhing thams cad du snyoms pas thams cad
mkhyen pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed pa 'di ni/ sems can gyi gtso bo'i chos brgyad pa'o/ /'jig rten pa'i bde ba thams cad yongs su spangs te/ 'jig rten pa'i dga' ba thams cad la
ma chags pa dang / 'jig rten thams cad kyis gos pa med pa'i smon lam thams cad du mnyam pa nyid kyis 'jig rten thams cad bde ba thams cad dang ldan par byas te/ sdug bsngal
dang | spros pa thams cad rab tu 'joms pa 'di ni/ sems can gyi gtso bos chos dgu pa'o/ /sdug bsngal gyi mi bde ba thams cad nyams su bab ste/ 'gro ba
thams cad kyi don du dka' thub kyis shin tu gdungs kyang bla bar sems bskyed pas/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rigs yongs su bsrung ba dang ldan pa dang / stobs bcu'i sa'i bar
du sangs rgyas kyi yul la mos pas mthar thug pa 'di ni/ sems can gyi gtso bo'i chos bcu pa ste/ kye rgyal ba'i sras/ bcu po de dag ni/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams
kyi sems can gyi gtso bo'i chos so/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras/ bcu po 'di dag ni/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi rnam par spyod pa chags pa med pa rnams te /
bcu gang zhe na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni 'jig rten gyi khams ma lus pa thams cad du gshegs pas chags pa mi mnga' bar rnam par spyod pa yin/ sangs rgyas
bcom ldan 'das rnams ni/ 'jig rten gyi khams ma lus pa thams cad na bzhugs pas chags pa mi mnga' bar rnam par spyod pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams
ni| 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad na bzhugs pa dang / bzhengs pa dang / bzhud pas chags pa mi mnga' bar rnam par spyod pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni/
'jig rten gyi khams ma lus pa thams cad du chos ston pas chags pa mi mnga' bar rnam par spyod pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni/ 'jig rten gyi khams ma lus
pa thams cad kyi dga' ldan gyi gnas na bzhugs kyang / chags pa mi mnga' bar rnam par spyod pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni/ chos kyi dbyings ma lus pa thams
kyi sngon gyi mtha' dang / phyi ma'i mtha' dang / da ltar byung ba'i mtha' la chags pa mi mnga' bar rnam par spyod pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni/ chos kyi dbyings
ma lus pa thams cad tsam gyi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor na bzhugs kyang chags pa mi mnga' bar rnam par spyod pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni/ sems can ma
lus pa thams cad kyi sems dang spyod pa la gzigs shing / thugs kyi skad cig gcig la cho 'phrul chen po gsum gyis sems can rnam par 'dul yang chags pa mi mnga' bar
rnam par spyod pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni/ sku gcig gis kyang tshad med bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i sangs rgyas kyi rnam par spyod pa chen por rnam par spyod kyang
chags pa mi mnga' bar rnam par spyod pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni/ sems can gyi khams 'byams klas pa ma lus pa thams cad du de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos
ma lus pa thams cad kyi mthar thug pa bsam gyis mi khyab par ston cing gsung yang / chags pa mi mnga' bar rnam par spyod pa yin te/ kye rgyal ba'i sras/
bcu po de dag ni/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi rnam par spyod pa chags pa med pa'o/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras/ bcu po 'di dag ni/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan
'das rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi rgyan mchog dam pa bla na med pa rnams te/ bcu gang zhe na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sku mtshan dang dpe byad bzang po sna tshogs kyis
rnam par brgyan pa ni/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sku'i rgyan mchog dam pa bla na med pa'o/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi gsung yan lag gi mchog dam
pa drug cu dang ldan zhing yan lag lnga brgyas yongs su bzung ba dang / rgyan brgya stong du mas rab tu brgyan pa dang / dbyangs kyi yan lag mtha' yas mu med pas rnam par dag pa
dang | sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi don dang / tshig dang / yi ge brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pas rab tu tshim par mdzad pa dang / bag tsha ba mi mnga' bas seng+ge'i nga ro chen po
sgrogs pa dang / 'jigs pa med pa chen pos bsnyengs pa mi mnga' bar gyur pa dang / chos kyi dbyings ma lus pa thams cad du sems can thams cad la grags cing bsal te
khong du chud par 'gyur ba dang / sems can bsam pa tha dad pa dang / dbang po tha dad pa rnam pa sna tshogs 'dul bar nye bar gnas pa 'di ni/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi gsung
gi rgyan mchog dam pa bla na med pa'o/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi thugs kyi 'phrin las ni stobs bcus brgyan pa/ sangs rgyas kyi ting nge 'dzin chen po thams cad kyi me tog
shin tu rgyas pa/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi rgyan gyis shin tu brgyan cing bsgrubs pas chags pa med pa'i spyod yul dang ldan pa/ chos kyi dbyings kyi gzhi la rab tu
rten pa/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyi chos gting med pa rab tu brnyes pa/ chos kyi dbyings ma lus pa thams cad kyi rgyan du gyur pa/ dus gsum gyi chos kyi dbyings ma lus pa thams
cad kyi sems can kun gyi sems dang spyod pa thams cad skad cig gcig dang ldan pa'i shes rab kyi rab tu mkhyen pa ste/ 'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi thugs kyi rgyan
mchog dam pa bla na med pa'o/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni 'od zer bye ba brjod du med pa rab tu 'gyed par mdzad de/ 'od zer de dag re re la yang 'od zer gyi 'khor gyi dra
ba brjod du med pa dang ldan pa/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'byams klas pa thams cad ma lus par snang bar byed cing / 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud thams cad mun pa med par ston pa/
sangs rgyas skye ba dang mi 'brel bas sangs rgyas kyi 'phrin las las phyir mi ldog cing don yod pa/ sangs rgyas skye ba brjod du med pas gnas pa med pa rang
bzhin rnam par dag cing / kun du snyoms par 'byung ba ste/ 'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi 'od zer gyi rgyan mchog dam pa bla na med pa'o/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
rnams bzhad mo 'dzum par ston na/ zhal gyi sgo nas 'od zer kha dog sna tshogs kha dog du ma dang ldan pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong brjod du med pa phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams ma
lus pa thams cad snang bar byed pa/ sems can gyi khams tshad med grangs med bsam gyis mi khyab pa rnam par ston pa/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu rnam pa
gzhan du mi 'gyur bar lung ston pa/ 'gro ba thams cad du shin tu gsal bar 'byung ste/ 'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi bzhad mo 'dzum pa bstan pa'i rgyan mchog
dam pa bla na med pa'o/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi chos kyi sku ni tshad med pa ste/ bsgribs pa med pas rnam par dag pa chos thams cad chags pa med pa nyid kyi mthar
thug pa/ mtha' dang dbus med pa'i chos kyi dbyings la gnas pa/ 'jig rten thams cad dang ma 'dres pa/ 'jig rten thams cad dang 'dzi ba med pa/ 'jig rten thams cad kyi de
kho na nyid la yang dag par zhugs pa/ 'jig rten thams cad las gyen du 'phags pa/ 'jig rten thams cad las 'das pa'i chos kyis yang dag par spyod pa/ tshig gi lam dang bral
ba| brjod du med pa'i mthar phyin pa/ phung po dang / khams dang / skye mched dang bral ba ste/ 'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi chos kyi sku'i rgyan mchog dam pa bla na med
pa'o| |sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni 'od tshad med pa mnga' ba ste/ 'jig rten gyi khams ma lus pa thams cad du 'od ma 'dres shing rgyan du ma dang ldan pa/ kha dog sna tshogs
brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i rgyan dang ldan pa/ 'od kyi snang ba kun du thogs pa med cing thams cad du chags pa med pa/ 'od kyi dkyil 'khor bsgribs pa med pa tshad med
pa'i mdzod du gyur pa/ 'od thams cad kyi 'byung gnas su gyur pa ste/ 'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi 'od kyi rgyan mchog dam pa bla na med pa'o/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan
'das rnams ni kha dog mtha' yas pa mnga' ba ste/ kha dog yid du 'ong ba mnga' ba'o/ /kha dog 'od gsal ba mnga' ba'o/ /kha dog tshad med pa mnga' ba'o/ /sems can gyi khams ma
lus pa thams cad kyi bsam pa dang mos pa bzhin du rnam par dmigs pa'i kha dog mnga' ba'o/ /de ma yin pa'i kha dog gzhan khams gsum du gtogs pa thams cad zil gyis
gnon pa'i kha dog mnga' ba'o/ /kha dog thams cad kyi pha rol tu phyin pa brnyes pas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni kha dog bla na med pa mnga' ba ste/ 'di ni
sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi kha dog gi rgyan mchog dam pa bla na med pa'o/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni dge bas shin tu rnam par dag pa ste/ 'das pa dang / ma byon
pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rigs dge ba rin po che'i 'byung gnas su gyur pa la shin tu byung ba'o/ /chos nyid kyi rnam pa thams cad du khyad par yod pa dang / khyad
par med pa'i spyod pas rnam par dag pa'i rgyan gyi ye shes skye ba thams cad kyi nang du gtogs pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs bsgribs pa med pa'i rgyud rnam par dag pas
'jig rten gyi mi snyan pa thams cad kyis mi snyan pa brjod du med pa ste/ 'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi rigs dang rgyud rnam par dag pa'i rgyan mchog dam pa
bla na med pa'o/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni byams pa chen po'i mthu dang / rang bzhin gyi rgyan mnga' ba ste/ shin tu dang ba yongs su rtog pa'i rnyog pa mi mnga' ba sku'i 'phrin
las yongs su gsal ba/ blta bas mi skyo ba/ thugs shin tu rnam par gsal ba/ thugs rje chen po mnga' ba/ 'gro ba thams cad skyo ba pa yon gyi gnas kyi dam pa/ bla na med pa
yongs su 'dzin pa'i nang na thugs brtse ba can phan par mdzad pa/ sems can thams cad kyi don du ye shes chen po byin gyis brlabs te/ bsod nams chen pos yongs su 'phags pa/ 'gro ba
thams cad kyi bsod nams kyi zhing du gyur pa/ sems can rnams kyi yon tan dang / ye shes kyi phung po thams cad rnam par 'phel bar mdzad pa ste/ 'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
rnams kyi byams pa chen po dang / thugs rje chen po'i mthar thug pa'i bsod nams kyi rgyan mchog dam pa bla na med pa'o/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras/ bcu po de dag ni/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan
'das rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi rgyan mchog dam pa bla na med pa'o/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras/ bcu po 'di dag ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi mnga' chen pos mnga'
bsgyur ba'i chos rnams te/ bcu gang zhe na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni chos thams cad la mnga' ba dang / chos thams cad la snang bar mdzad pa'i mnga' bsgyur bas/ tshig
dang yi ge mtha' yas pa la thogs pa mi mnga' ba'i spobs pa mnga' ba dang / chos thams cad ma lus par yongs su brjod pas mnga' che ba ste/ 'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams
kyi sangs rgyas kyi mnga' chen pos mnga' bsgyur ba'i chos dang po'o/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni sems can ji ltar yongs su smin pa dang / smon lam ji ltar btab pa'i tshul
bzhin du 'dul ba la thogs pa mi mnga' bas mnga' che ste/ 'di ni sangs rgyas kyi mnga' chen pos mnga' ba sgyur ba'i chos gnyis pa'o/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
rnams ni 'jig rten gyi khams ma lus pa thams cad sems can gcig la'ang gnod pa med par rnam pa drug tu rab tu bskyod pa dang / 'jig rten gyi khams rgyan rnam par bkod pa grangs
med tshad med pa dang ldan pa/ nam mkha'i dbyings kyi mthas gtugs pa thams cad gcig nas gcig tu 'phang ba dang / gcig nas gcig tu gzhug pa dang / gcig nas gcig tu bsdu
ba dang / gcig nas gcig tu bsre bas 'jig rten gyi khams gzhan dang / gzhan dag gzhan dang gzhan gyi phyogs su rab tu bzhag kyang / sems can gyi khams rnams 'khor
zhing rmongs par mi 'gyur la the tshom du mi 'gyur bar mdzad pas mnga' che ba ste/ 'di ni sangs rgyas kyi mnga' chen pos mnga' bsgyur ba'i chos gsum pa'o/ /sangs rgyas bcom
ldan 'das rnams ni 'jig rten gyi khams ma lus pa thams cad byin gyis rlob pa'i ye shes kyis 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyan phan tshun du byin gyis brlab pa dang / thugs skad
cig gis 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rgyan yang dag par bstan pa dang / bskal pa grangs med par brjod kyang yi ge shin tu bstan pa zad mi shes pa dang / 'jig rten
gyi khams ma lus pa thams cad rgyan thams cad kyis rnam par brgyan pa dang / mi mthun pa med cing nye bar nyon mongs pa med pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing gcig tu yongs su 'du bar sangs
rgyas kyi zhing rnam par dag pa thams cad byin gyis brlab pa la mnga' che ba ste/ 'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi mnga' chen pos mnga' bsgyur ba'i chos bzhi
pa'o| |sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni sangs rgyas kyis 'dul ba'i sems can gzigs na sems can gcig gi don du bskal pa brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med par skyil mo krung gcig gis
bzhugs na yang de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku la mi bde ba mi mnga' zhing thugs la mi bde ba mi mnga' ste/ gang zag de yang mi bsnyel bas 'dul ba'i dus las mi 'da' ba dang / gang zag gcig
la ji lta ba de bzhin du rim pa rim pas 'jig rten gyi khams ma lus pa thams cad du phyi ma'i mtha'i mur thug pa'i sku tshe la mnga' bar byin gyis brlabs te bzhugs kyang sangs rgyas bcom
ldan 'das rnams la skyo ba mi mnga' ba ste/ de ltar sems can gyi khams thams cad mthar gyis rim pas/ sangs rgyas kyis 'dul ba'i gang zag gi don du yongs su skyong ba mdzad pa la
mnga' che ba ste/ 'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi mnga' chen pos mnga' bsgyur ba'i chos lnga pa'o/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni/ 'jig rten gyi khams ma lus pa
thams cad du yang dag par gzhol ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i bzhud pas 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du bzhud pa la thag thogs mi mnga' ba dang /
phyogs bcu'i chos kyi dbyings ma lus pa thams cad kyi 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud rgya mtsho 'byams klas pa dang / phyogs kyi dra ba'i rgyud thams cad du thugs skad cig gcig dang
ldan pas bzhud par byin gyis rlob cing chos kyi dbyings shin tu bstan pa khong du chud par bya bas/ chos kyi 'khor lo thogs pa med pa rab tu bskor ba la mnga' che ba ste/ 'di ni
sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi mnga' chen pos mnga' bsgyur ba'i chos drug pa'o/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni 'dul ba'i sems can gyi khams thams cad
kyi don du thugs skad cig re re la bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par 'tshang rgya bar mnga' che ba ste/ de la chos thams cad mngon par sangs rgyas pa gang
yang med la/ gang gis mngon par sangs rgyas pa'ang med de/ mngon par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ba med kyang / slob pa'i sa la gnas shing mngon par 'tshang rgya bar yang mi brjod
pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad kyang bsgribs pa med par rtogs par thugs su chud pas sems can thams cad 'dul ba'i don du ye shes tshad med pa'i tshul gyis /
sangs rgyas kyi rnam par 'phrul pa chen po'i yul yongs su rgyun mi gcod pa 'di ni/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi mnga' chen pos mnga' bsgyur ba'i chos bdun pa'o//
sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das ni spyan gyi skye mched kyis sangs rgyas kyi 'phrin las gang bsgrub pa de snyan gyi skye mched kyis yongs su grub par mdzad do/ /snyan gyi skye mched kyis sangs rgyas kyi
'phrin las gang bsgrub pa de shangs kyi skye mched kyis yongs su grub par mdzad do/ /shangs kyi skye mched kyis sangs rgyas kyi 'phrin las gang bsgrub pa de ljags kyi skye mched kyis yongs
su grub par mdzad do/ /ljags kyi skye mched kyis sangs rgyas kyi 'phrin las gang bsgrub pa de ni sku'i skye mched kyis yongs su grub par mdzad do/ /sku'i skye mched kyis sangs rgyas kyi 'phrin
las gang bsgrub pa de thugs kyi skye mched kyis yongs su grub par mdzad do/ /thugs kyi skye mched kyis sangs rgyas kyi 'phrin las gang bsgrub pa de 'jig rten gyi khams ma lus pa thams
cad kyi dmigs pa 'jig rten pa dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa sna tshogs rnam par phye ba thams cad du grub par mdzad do/ /de bzhin du dmigs pa thams cad re re yang snrel zhing bsgrub
pas| sangs rgyas kyi 'phrin las bsgrub pa la mnga' che ba ste/ 'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi mnga' chen pos mnga' bsgyur ba'i chos brgyad pa'o/ /sangs
rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni rang gi sku'i ba spu'i bu ga gcig gi nang du sems can gyi khams ma lus pa thams cad gzud par mdzad cing khongs su chud
bar mdzad pa dang / sems can re re zhing yang lus sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa tsam du yangs par mdzad kyang / sems can de dag la gnod pa dang / mi bde bar mi 'gyur ba
dang | de dag du yang sems can re re zhing 'jig rten gyi khams gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pas bskal pa grangs med pa zad par gnas par bya ba dang / 'jig rten gyi khams grangs
med par gom pa gcig gis phyin pas 'jig rten gyi khams de dag tu sangs rgyas byung ba rnams kyi spyan sngar 'gro bar bya ba dang / sangs rgyas de dag byung ba'i tshe yang brjod du med
pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud dang gling de dag na sems can gyi gtso bos brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar bya ba dang / ba spu'i bu ga de nas
sangs rgyas gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa 'byung bar bya ba dang / sems can gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du
med pa 'byung bar bya ba dang / chos kyi 'khor lo gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa bskor bar bya ba dang / chos kyi dbyings bstan pa gcig nas
gcig tu brgyud pa brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa shin tu bstan par bya ba dang / 'das pa gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa brjod du med pa dang / ma 'ongs pa gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa
brjod du med pa dang / da ltar byung ba gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa brjod du med pa yongs su brjod par bya ba dang / nam mkha'i dbyings mtha' dang dbus med par bstan pa kun tu mtshams med par
sems can thams cad 'ong zhing 'gro ba dang / skye ba'i skye mched thams cad du 'dod pa'i longs spyod rgya chen po bgegs med pa thams cad 'byung bar bya ba la mnga' che ba ste/ 'di ni sangs rgyas
bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi mnga' chen pos mnga' sgyur ba'i chos dgu pa'o/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni chos kyi dbyings ma lus pa thams cad du pad+mo'i rgyan chen
pos brgyan pa'i seng+ge'i khri pad+mo'i snying po can la de bzhin gshegs pa gcig gi chos kyi dbyings tshad med pa thams cad du khyab pa'i skus byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas te
sangs rgyas kyi rnam par 'phrul pa thams cad yongs su bstan pa mdzad pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa gcig gi ji lta bar 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi
sems can gyi gtso bo thams cad kyang de bzhin du dgongs pa skad cig ma re re'i byin gyis rlabs kyis brlabs pa dang / dgongs pa skad cig la ji lta ba bzhin du dgongs pa skad cig thams
cad la'ang pad+mo'i rgyud kyis yongs su dag par mngon par 'tshang rgya bar bya ba dang / de bzhin du chos kyi dbyings thams cad ma lus pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing
brjod du med pa rnam par dag pa rgyan sna tshogs dang ldan pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams su dmigs pa rnam pa sna tshogs dang ldan pa'i zhing rnam par dag pa 'byams klas pa brjod du med pa
mtshan nyid tha dad pa rnam pa tha dad pa'i rgyud tshad med cing 'byams klas pa dus kyi rgyud grangs med pa dang ldan pa/ bstan pa ma 'dres pa dang ldan pa/ blo tshad med pa dang / mos pa shin tu
yangs pa dang ldan pa/ mtshan nyid sna tshogs kyi gnas med pa/ mtshan nyid bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang ldan pa/ tshad med pa thams cad dgongs pa skad cig ma las dgongs pa skad cig
ma gcig gis thams cad yongs su bstan kyang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ched du sgrub pa mi mdzad pa la mnga' che ba ste/ 'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sangs
rgyas kyi mnga' chen pos mnga' bsgyur ba'i chos bcu pa'o/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras/ bcu po de dag ni/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi mnga' chen pos mnga' bsgyur
ba'i chos so/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras/ bcu po 'di dag ni/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi chos yongs su rdzogs pa tshad med pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa rnams te/
bcu gang zhe na/ mtshan re re zhing bsod nams brgya pa'i mtshan yongs su dag par 'gyur ba 'di ni yongs su rdzogs pa dang po ste/ des sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams byang chub tu
mngon par 'tshang rgya'o/ /sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams yongs su rdzogs pas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams byang chub tu mngon par 'tshang rgya'o/ /dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad yongs su
rdzogs pas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams byang chub tu mngon par 'tshang rgya'o/ /yon tan thams cad kyi 'byung gnas phun sum tshogs pa'i spyod pa yongs su dag pa yongs su rdzogs
pas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams byang chub tu mngon par 'tshang rgya'o/ /sems can yongs su smin par bya ba dang / 'dul ba yongs su rdzogs pas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
rnams byang chub tu mngon par 'tshang rgya'o/ /sangs rgyas kyi mnga' 'gro ba thams cad kyis zil gyis gnon pa yongs su rdzogs pas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams byang chub tu
mngon par 'tshang rgya'o/ /zhing yongs su dag par bya ba yongs su rdzogs pas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams byang chub tu mngon par 'tshang rgya'o/ /thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes yongs
su rdzogs pas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams byang chub tu mngon par 'tshang rgya'o/ /mtshan dang dpe byad bzang po dang / gzugs kyi sku blta na don yod par yongs su rdzogs pas
sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams byang chub tu mngon par 'tshang rgya'o/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang mnyam pa nyid yongs su rdzogs pas
sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams byang chub tu mngon par 'tshang rgya ste/ sangs rgyas kyi 'phrin las thams cad yongs su rdzogs par mdzad nas/ yongs su mya ngan las 'da'o//
kye rgyal ba'i sras/ bcu po de dag ni/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi chos yongs su rdzogs pa tshad med pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa'o/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras/
bcu po 'di dag ni/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi thabs mkhas pa ste/ bcu gang zhe na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni chos thams cad byin gyis brlabs pa
med cing spros pa thams cad med par yang thugs su chud la/ dge ba'i sgo nas sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyang shin tu ston cing brjod de/ 'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan
'das rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi thabs mkhas pa dang po'o/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni chos thams cad la gzigs pa med cing phan tshun du mkhyen pa med do/ /ma
bcings ma gol ba dang / gzung ba med cing bsags pa med de/ yongs su rdzogs pa med par yang thugs su chud la sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad la mnga' dam pa yang brnyes te/
sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams chos thams cad la mnga' bsgyur ba de yang yang dag pa de kho na nyid ma nor ba rnam pa gzhan du mi 'gyur ba dang / chos thams cad bdag gi med cing yongs
su 'dzin pa med la de kho na nyid kyi mtha' las rnam par mi 'da' yang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni mnga' chen pos chos kyi dbyings thams cad snang ba la'ang rab tu mkhyen pa 'di ni/
sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi thabs mkhas pa gnyis pa'o/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni mtshan ma'i mtha' thams cad mi mnga' ste/ mtshan ma
thams cad dang mi 'grogs shing / mtshan ma'i mngon par shes pa thams cad dang ma 'dres la/ de'i rang bzhin du ngo bo nyid med pa dang / ji ltar ngo bo nyid med pa'i sgra'i tshul thams
cad thugs su chud kyang gzugs kyi mtshan ma'i sku gzugs rnam par dag pa grangs med pa dang / zhing gi mtshan ma dang / rnam par spyod pa'i mtshan ma zad mi shes pa rnam pa sna tshogs
yang dag par bstan cing bshad pa'i ye shes kyi phung po mun pa med pa 'gro ba thams cad kyi sgron ma chen por gyur pas mun pa med pa'i snang ba ston pa 'di ni/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan
'das rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi thabs mkhas pa gsum pa'o/ /chags pa med pa'i mtha' ni sngon gyi mtha' yang ma yin/ phyi ma'i mtha' yang ma yin/ da ltar byung ba yang ma yin te/
chos kyi dbyings su gnas pa ni 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba yang ma yin pas/ de bzhin nyid kyi mtshan nyid kyis 'byung ba med kyang
sangs rgyas 'byung ba rnams kyi rigs tshad med pa'i phyir shin tu bstan pa brjod du med pas 'das pa dang / ma byon pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas pa skye ba yang rab tu brjod
cing kun tu gzigs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi yul gyis de bzhin du gzigs pa 'di ni/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi thabs mkhas pa bzhi pa'o/ /sangs rgyas bcom
ldan 'das rnams ni sku'i 'phrin las dang / gsung gi 'phrin las dang / thugs kyi 'phrin las kyi mngon par 'du mdzad pa yang mi mnga' la yongs su blang ba mi mnga' bas bzhugs
shing rnam par phye ba med pa'i mthar thug pa ste/ dor ba med pa'i chos kyi gnas kyi pha rol tu phyin la bgrang ba'i tshul las rnam par 'das kyang tshul grangs med pa'i mdzod du gyur
cing | bgrang ba dang mngon par sgrub pa mtha' yas pa dang / 'jig rten pa dang 'jig rten las 'das pa rnam pa sna tshogs tha dad pa'i grangs kyi tshul thugs su chud pa ye shes bsgrigs
pa med pas gzigs pa rnams te/ chos kyi dbyings ma lus pa thams cad kyi sems can gdul ba rnam par dmigs pa la rdzu 'phrul sna tshogs tshad med mu med par mngon
par sgrub pa mdzad pa 'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi thabs mkhas pa lnga pa'o/ /chos thams cad lta ba med pas tha mi dad pa dang / bye brag med pa dang / 'byung ba med
pa dang / mtshan nyid med pa dang / sna tshogs med pa dang / blang ba med pa dang / dor ba med pa dang / rang bzhin med par rab tu mkhyen kyang chos kyi rgyud shin tu nges par yang dag par sgrub cing
'jig rten gyi tshul dang 'gal ba med pa dang / rang bzhin med pa yang yang dag par gzigs pas thams cad mkhyen pa/ thams cad gzigs pa/ mkhyen par bya ba thams cad ma lus par
gzigs pas chos la mnga' bsgyur ba thams cad kyang rab tu ston la/ de bzhin nyid kyi rang bzhin las kyang mi nyams pa 'di ni/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi thabs
mkhas pa drug pa'o/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni thugs su chud pa'i rnam pa gcig gis gzhan dang gzhan mkhyen par bya ba/ chos de'i skyon med pa las rnam par ma 'das pa
gnas pa med pa/ dge ba'i rtsa ba rnam par dag pa mnyam pa nyid kyi chos skyon med pas dus thams cad du gnas pa rab tu mkhyen te/ de la yang nyi ma gcig gam/ zla ba phyed dam/ lo gcig
gam/ lo brgya'am/ bskal pa 'jig pa dang / 'du bas rjes su bsnyag pa dang / phyir phyogs pa mi mnga' bar dus tshad med pa dang / nyi ma gcig dang / yud tsam gcig gi dus dang / snga
dro nas nyi ma phyed kyi dus dang / phyi dro nas snga dro'i dus dang / nyi ma gung nas phyi dro'i dus dang / nyi ma 'grangs pa'i dus dang / nyi ma bdun dang / zla ba phyed kyi dus
dang | zla ba dang / lo dang / lo brgya'i dus dang / bskal pa gcig gi dus dang / tshad med grangs med pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dus nas/ phyi ma'i mtha'i mur thug pa'i dus su chos
bstan pa dang / chos kyi 'khor lo thogs pa med cing phyir mi ldog /rgyun chad par mi 'gyur/ bral bar mi 'gyur/ bar chad par mi 'gyur/ med par mi 'gyur/ 'jig par mi 'gyur/
g.yo bar mi 'gyur/ ring du mi 'gyur/ 'khor de na gnas pa nyid du yang rgyun chad par mi 'gyur te/ 'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi thabs mkhas pa bdun
pa'o| |sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni chos kyi dbyings ma lus pa thams cad du rtag tu dus la bab par bzhugs pa ste/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni mi 'jigs
pa tshad med pa mnga' ba'o/ /tha dad pa yang dag par mkhyen pa grangs med pa mnga' ba'o/ /tha dad pa yang dag par mkhyen pa tshad med pa mnga' ba'o/ /tha dad pa yang dag par mkhyen
pa zad mi shes pa mnga' ba'o/ /tha dad pa yang dag par mkhyen pa thogs pa med pa mnga' ba'o/ /tha dad pa yang dag par mkhyen pa mtha' yas pa mnga' ba'o/ /thun mong ma yin pa'i

tha dad pa yang dag par mkhyen pa mnga' ba'o/ /tha dad pa yang dag par mkhyen pa mthar thug pa med pa mnga' ba'o/ /tha dad pa yang dag par mkhyen pa de kho na dang ldan pa mnga' ba'o/ /tha dad pa yang
dag par mkhyen pa tshig gi tshul thams cad rab tu rtogs pa mnga' ba'o/ /chos thams cad tha dad pa yang dag par mkhyen pa mnga' ba'o/ /bsam pa dang / mos pa dang / dbang po ji lta ba
bzhin du chos kyi tshul dang / rnam grangs tshul ji ltar rnam par bkod pa bzhin dus mtshams med par ston te/ mdo sde bye ba khrag khrig brjod du med pa'i yang brjod pa med pa rnams mdo
sde de dang de la thog ma dang / tha ma dang / dbus kyi tshul gyis yang dag par ston te/ 'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi thabs mkhas pa brgyad pa'o/ /sangs
rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni ming med kyang / ming dang rigs su byung ba'i chos thams cad tshig dang / yi ges shin tu dbyangs pa'i dbyings mngon par sangs rgyas pa ste/ ming 'das pa
ma yin pa dang / ming ma 'ongs pa ma yin pa dang / ming da ltar byung ba ma yin pa dang / ming sems can ma yin pa dang / ming zhing ma yin pa dang / ming chos ma yin pa dang / ming yon
tan ma yin pa dang / ming byang chub sems dpa' ma yin pa dang / ming sangs rgyas ma yin pa dang / ming grangs ma yin pa dang / ming grangs med pa ma yin pa dang / ming skye ba ma yin pa
dang | ming 'gag pa ma yin pa dang / ming med pa ma yin pa dang / ming yod pa ma yin pa dang / ming gcig pa ma yin pa dang / ming tha dad pa ma yin pa
dang | ming thams cad ma yin pa dang / chos thams cad rang bzhin gyis brjod du med pa dang / phyogs med pa dang / brda med pa dang / tshig gi lam med pa dang / sgra dang bral
ba| sgra'i rnam pa thams cad mi 'byung ba yongs su bsgrubs pa med pa/ byas pa dang rnam par byas pa med pa/ rnam pa gcig ma yin pa/ rnam pa mang po ma yin pa yang thugs
su chud la brjod pa dang / spyod pa thams cad la yang pha rol tu phyin pa'i mchog brnyes pa dag ste/ rnam par rtog pa'i yul mi mnga' ba dag go /mngon par 'du mdzad pa med pa
la rab tu brtson pa dag go /rtog pa dang / kun tu rtog pa dang / yongs su rtog pa 'gag pa dag go /spyod pa thams cad la mi gnas par spyod pa dag ste/ 'di ni sangs rgyas
bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi thabs mkhas pa dgu pa'o/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni chos thams cad kyi gzugs ma skyes pa rab tu mkhyen pa ste/ tshor
ba'i spros pa med pa dang / 'du shes kyi grangs med pa dang / 'du byed kun tu rgyu ba med pa dang / rnam par shes pa nye bar len pa med pa dang / rang bzhin gyis zhi bar rab tu
mkhyen te/ chos thams cad skye mched kyi rgyud med pa dang / khams rnams mi dmigs pa dang / chos thams cad mi 'jigs pa dang / chos thams cad bskyod du med cing rang bzhin gyis
nam mkha' lta bu dang / chos thams cad dben pa dang / las med pa dang / rnam par smin pa med pa dang / spyod pas 'byung ba med pa dang / ma grub pa dang / ma byung ba dang / grangs kyis mi
brjod pa dang / yod pa ma yin pa dang / med pa ma yin pa dang / ma skyes pa dang / ma 'gags pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa dang / skyon med pa
dang | gnas med pa dang / yongs su gnas pa med pa dang / yongs su smin par byas pa med pa dang / rnam par btul ba med pa dang / sems can med pa dang / sems can med pa ma yin
pa dang / srog med pa dang / srog med pa ma yin pa dang / rkyen med pa dang / rkyen med pa ma yin pa dang / rten pa med pa dang / rten pa med pa ma yin par chos thams cad thugs su chud kyang
chos kyi dbyings thams cad shin tu bstan pa la pha rol tu phyin pa'i dam pa brnyes pa dag ste/ nges pa dang / ma nges pa dang / log par nges pa'i phung po gsum rnam par dgod pa
rnams la stobs bcus thugs su chud pa'i ye shes mi 'jigs pa bzhis rnam par dag pa'i sangs rgyas kyi yul chen po dang ldan pas seng ge'i sgra sgrog pa 'di ni/ sangs rgyas
bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi thabs mkhas pa bcu pa ste/ kye rgyal ba'i sras/ bcu po de dag ni/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi
sangs rgyas kyi thabs mkhas pa'o/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras/ bcu po 'di dag ni/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi 'phrin las rgya chen po tshad med pa bsam gyis mi
khyab pa rnams te/ de dag ni sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs ma gtogs par lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten dang / 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i nyan thos dang / rang
sangs rgyas thams cad kyis 'jug par mi nus pa'o/ /bcu gang zhe na/ phyogs bcu'i nam mkha'i dbyings kyi mthas gtugs pa'i chos kyi dbyings thams cad kyi 'jig rten gyi
khams ma lus pa thams cad du dga' ldan du skye ba bstan pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa mu med pa dag la sangs rgyas kyi 'phrin las mdzad de/ kha dog tshad med pa /
gzi brjid tshad med pa/ snang ba tshad med pa/ dbyangs tshad med pa/ dbyangs kyi yan lag rnam par dag pa tshad med pa/ gsung brjod pas rnam par dmigs pa tshad med pa/
ting nge 'dzin tshad med pa la spyod pa/ shes rab dang / ye shes yul tshad med pa mnga' ba rnams lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten la phan 'dogs pa mdzad de/ bdud dang bcas
pa| tshangs pa dang bcas pa/ dge sbyong dang bram ze'i skye dgu dang bcas pa/ lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten la phan 'dogs pa mdzad do/ /byams pa chen po'i spyod yul thogs
pa med pa dang / thabs thugs rje chen po'i sgo'i mthar thug pas sems can la phan 'dogs pa mdzad do/ /bsod nams kyi stobs dang / mnga' phun sum tshogs pa dang / dbang po rnam
par sbyang ba dang / cang shes kyi sems yongs su dag pas kyang sems can rnams la phan 'dogs pa mdzad do/ /theg pa sna tshogs rnam par dag pas kyang sems can rnams la phan 'dogs
pa mdzad do/ /theg pa chen po yongs su rdzogs par bya bas kyang sems can rnams la phan 'dogs par mdzad do/ /'gro ba thams cad gdon pas kyang sems can rnams la phan 'dogs
pa mdzad de/ 'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi 'phrin las dang po'o/ /dga' ldan gyi pho brang nas 'phos pa med kyang yum gyi skur gshegs shing / byang chub
sems dpa'i sku tha ma skye bar bstan pa/ sgyu ma lta bur yongs su spyod pa/ sprul pa lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin gyi mthar thug pa/ mig yor lta bur rnam par dmigs pa/ nam mkha'i yul
tshad med par khyab pa/ bzhed pa bzhin du skye yang chags pa mi mnga' ba/ smig rgyu ba lta bur bstan pa/ nyon mongs pa med pa'i chos la yang dag par gzhol ba/ gnas med pa'i
ye shes la gnas pa/ rang bzhin gyis 'dod chags dang bral bas rnam par dag pa/ rgyan shin tu rgya che ba'i mdzod kyis sangs rgyas kyi 'phrin las mdzad do/ /
khang pa brtsegs pa rin po che las byas pa'i pho brang chen po rin po che'i rgyan mang po ldan pa na bzhugs pas kyang sangs rgyas kyi 'phrin las mdzad do/ /rdzu 'phrul gyis kyang sangs rgyas kyi
'phrin las mdzad do/ /yid la bya ba byin gyi rlabs chen pos kyang sangs rgyas kyi 'phrin las mdzad do/ /rnam par 'phrul ba'i mdzod chen po yang dag par bstan pas kyang sangs rgyas kyi
'phrin las mdzad do/ /ye shes kyi nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor chen pos kyang sangs rgyas kyi 'phrin las mdzad do/ /yum sku skyed pa'i sku na bzhugs pas kyang sangs rgyas kyi 'phrin las mdzad
do| |sangs rgyas kyi yul gyi spyod yul chen po brnyes pas kyang sangs rgyas kyi 'phrin las mdzad do/ /sangs rgyas kyi byin gyis 'jig rten byin du brlabs pa mtha' yas pas kyang sangs rgyas kyi
'phrin las mdzad do/ /ting nge 'dzin chen po grangs med pa la rnam par spyod cing snyoms par 'jug pas kyang sangs rgyas kyi 'phrin las mdzad do/ /ting nge 'dzin las bzhengs pa de dang de
dag gis kyang sangs rgyas kyi 'phrin las mdzad do/ /spyod pa'i thog ma la yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa chen po'i mthar thug pa'i bar du thog ma dang / dbus dang / tha ma'i tshul
gyis kyang sangs rgyas kyi 'phrin las mdzad do/ /sa 'di la gnyis su med pa thams cad mthar phyin par byas nas tha mar 'jig rten gyi grangs kyis skye ba yongs su ston te/ skye bas kyang 'jig
rten thams cad du sangs rgyas kyi 'phrin las mdzad do/ /gzhon nur gyur pas kyang 'jig rten thams cad du sangs rgyas kyi 'phrin las mdzad do/ /byang chub sems dpar gyur pas kyang
'jig rten thams cad du sangs rgyas kyi 'phrin las mdzad do/ /mngon par 'byung bas kyang 'jig rten thams cad du sangs rgyas kyi 'phrin las mdzad do/ /mngon par 'tshang rgya bas kyang 'jig
rten thams cad du sangs rgyas kyi 'phrin las mdzad do/ /chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bas kyang 'jig rten thams cad du sangs rgyas kyi 'phrin las mdzad do/ /thabs mkhas pa sna tshogs kyis
kyang 'jig rten sna tshogs/ 'jig rten tshad med pa/ 'jig rten kun tu mtha' yas pa phyogs kyi dra ba'i rgyud dang / rigs thams cad kyi 'jig rten ma lus pa thams cad du sangs rgyas kyi 'phrin
las mdzad do/ /zhing gi rgyud ma lus pa'i 'jig rten du sangs rgyas kyi 'phrin las mdzad do/ /las kyi rnam par smin pa ma lus pa'i 'jig rten du sangs rgyas kyi 'phrin las mdzad do/ /sems
can gyi rgyud ma lus pa'i 'jig rten du sangs rgyas kyi 'phrin las mdzad do/ /skye ba dang shi 'pho ba'i rgyud ma lus pa'i 'jig rten du sangs rgyas kyi 'phrin las mdzad do/ /sprul pa chen
po'i rgyud dang / sangs rgyas kyi rigs dang / chos dran pa'i sgo'i 'khor los kyang / sangs rgyas kyi 'phrin las mdzad de/ 'di na sangs rgyas bcom ldan
'das rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi 'phrin las gnyis pa'o/ /dge bar spyod pa'i las rnam par dag cing / gdung rabs thams cad du ye shes kyi tshul rnam par dag pas sku tshe'i rgyud kyi
tshul dang ldan pa/ sems can thams cad gdul ba thugs su chud pa/ dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad yongs su rdzogs par mdzad cing btsun mo'i 'khor gyi nang na bzhugs pa ston kyang /
sangs rgyas thams cad kyi 'dod chags dang bral ba'i tshul gyi gnas la bzhugs pa rnams sgra dang / tshig thams cad dang bral bar brtags pas dngos po thams cad dngos po med
pa las byung bar khong du chud par bya ba dang / dngos po thams cad shes pa la gzud par bya ba dang / tshul khrims thams cad thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi mthar thug par yongs
su rdzogs par bya ba dang / snying rje chen pos 'gro ba mu med pa la rnam par blta bar bya ba dang / byams pa chen pos sems can med pa'i yul la rab tu rtog par bya ba dang / dga' ba
chen pos 'jig rten brjod du med par khong du chud par bya ba dang / btang snyoms chen pos sems la dbang sgyur ba la gnas par bya ba dang / thams cad mkhyen pa'i yon tan gyis
rang yongs su rgyas par byed par bya ba dang / chos kyi dbyings kyi lus ma lus par mngon par bsgrub par bya ba dang / thams cad du gnas med pa'i lus yongs su rdzogs par byed par bya
ba dang / 'khor thams cad rnam par dag par nan tan du byed par bya ba dang / chos bstan pa rnam par brjod pa rab tu brjod par bya ba dang / 'jig rten gyi dngos po la smod par bya ba dang /
'gro ba thams cad kyi nyes pa la rtog par bya ba mdzad cing spyod pa dang / dge ba'i rtsa bar rnam par smin pa yang dag par bstan pa dang / ji ltar bkod pa'i tshul du sems can gdul ba dang /
yongs su ma smin pa'i sems can yongs su smin par bya ba dang / yongs su smin pa rnams tshul bzhin du gdul ba dang / grangs med pa'i thabs mkhas pa mngon par sgrub pa dang / sangs
rgyas kyi 'phrin las phyir mi ldog pa yongs su bstan pa dang / sgo sna tshogs nas chos kyi spyod pa rab tu brjod pa dang / sems can rnams kyi bsam pa sna tshogs rnam par sbyang ba dang / thugs
rje chen po las byung ba'i chos kyi sprin gyis mngon par spang ba dang / thams cad la skyob pa'i byams pa chen po bskyed pa'i cho 'phrul gsum gyis yongs su brlan pa dang / sangs rgyas
thams cad mthong ba dang / rnam par dmigs pa'i btsun mo'i 'khor gyi nang du bstan pa yan chad du 'jig rten mtha' dang dbus med par sangs rgyas kyi 'phrin las yongs su bstan pa
mdzad cing / ye shes kyi mthu chen po thogs pa med pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi mngon par mkhyen pa bsgribs pa med par bsgrubs pa dang / chos rnam pa gsum gyis
thabs mkhas pa dang ldan pa'i 'phrin las kyi mtha' dang / sku'i 'phrin las kyi mtha' shin tu rnam par dag pa dang / gsung gi 'phrin las ye shes nyams pa med pas rnam par dag
pa dang / thugs kyi 'phrin las kyi mtha' zab cing chags pa med pa'i mthar thug pa'i thabs la mkhas pas sems can rnams kyi don mdzad de/ 'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan
'das rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi 'phrin las gsum pa'o// //bam po drug cu lnga pa/ rnam par rgyal ba chen po mnga' ba rnams ni btsun mo'i 'khor rgyan rnam par skye ba
tshad med pa dang ldan pa yid du 'ong ba spangs te/ mngon par 'byung ba'i spyod pa yongs su bstan pas sems can rnams 'jig rten gyi gnas las bskyod pa dang / 'jig rten gyi
mngon par zhen pa rnam par bzlog pa dang / 'jig rten du gtogs pa thams cad mi rtag par shes par bya ba dang / 'jig rten gyi tshul la mngon par zhen pa rnam par bzlog pa dang
'jig rten gyi dga' ba la sred pa yongs su bcad pa dang / 'jig rten gyi nyon mongs pa byang zhing nub pa la yang dag par spyod par bya ba dang / sems can gyi don rjes su dran
par bya ba'i phyir/ mngon par 'byung ba'i don la rab tu gzhol ba dang / khyim pa'i tshul yongs su spang ba bstan pa dang / nyon mongs pa med pa'i chos kyi sbyor ba la yang dag par gnas par bya ba
dang | sngon gyi smon lam yongs su rdzogs par bya ba dang / yon tan gyi dkyil 'khor tshad med pa yongs su snang bar bya ba dang / ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor chen po brnyes pas sems can rnams
kyi mi shes pa'i sgrib pa rab tu bsal ba dang / bdag nyid bsod nams kyi zhing bla na med par gyur par 'gro ba thams cad la bstan pa dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad sangs rgyas la bskyed
pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba'i nang du 'dus par 'gro ba thams cad la yang dag par brjod pa dang / bdag nyid kyis ye shes kyi don gzigs par bstan pa dang / sems can rnams rnam par dag
pa'i sgor brjod pa dang / sems can rnams kha na ma tho ba med pa'i sgor sgrub pa dang / 'jig rten thams cad du 'byung ba'i sgo rab tu bstan pa dang / thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi rgyal
mtshan yang dag par bsgreng ba mdzad cing mngon par 'byung ba ste/ 'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi 'phrin las bzhi pa'o/ /don gcig ma yin pa mkhyen pa
dang ldan pa thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyi mthar thug pa rnams ni/ chos thams cad mngon par 'tshang rgya bar bya'o zhes byang chub kyi shing drung du byon te/ byang chub tu mngon par 'tshang
rgya bas kyang bdud kyi dpung thams cad rab tu gzhom pa dang / sku'i byin gyi rlabs kyi mdzod kyi chos kyi dbyings ma lus pa thams cad du rgyas par dgang ba'i
phyir| byin gyi rlabs zad mi shes pa'i mthar thug pas mtha' rnam par spangs pa spyod pa tshad med pa rab tu brnyes pa thams cad mkhyen pa'i yul gyis rnam par rol pa'i ye shes kyi don
dang ldan pa/ thams cad mkhyen pa'i yon tan yang dag par sgrub pa yongs su rdzogs pa/ 'jig rten gyi khams ma lus pa thams cad du gdan rnam par bkram pas yongs su rgyas pa/
sangs rgyas kyi zhing ma lus pa thams cad du byang chub sems dpa' rnam par dmigs pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa dam pa thob pa rnams kyis zhal du blta ba/ byang chub sems
dpa' thams cad kyi rnam pa dang / smon lam khyad par can dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor thams cad kyis yang dag par bsam pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo
zab mo rab tu bskor ba/ sangs rgyas kyi yul tshad med pa brtsams pas/ byang chub sems dpa' brjod du med pa'i 'byung gnas su gyur pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa sna tshogs
spyod pa la yang dag par gzhol ba'i byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor rnam par dag pa mnga' ba/ 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad sangs rgyas kyi byin gyis byin du
rlob pa'i yul mnga' ba/ dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa'i sems can gyis rnam par dmigs pa dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad tha mi dad pa dang ldan pa 'byung ba'i sa byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa mtha'
yas pa'i mthu'i gnas la yon tan gyi khyad par thams cad rab tu brnyes nas bzhugs pa 'jig rten gyi rnam pa thams cad ma lus pa'i mthar thug pa/ sems can gyi rnam pa thams
cad dang / zhing gi rnam pa thams cad dang / chos kyi rnam pa thams cad dang / byang chub sems dpa'i rnam pa thams cad dang / yongs su smin par bya ba'i rnam pa thams cad dang / dus kyi
rnam pa thams cad dang / 'dul ba'i rnam pa thams cad dang / sangs rgyas kyi rnam par 'phrul ba'i rnam pa thams cad ma lus par mthar thug pa rnams 'gro ba ma lus pa thams cad du
mos pa ji lta ba bzhin du rnam par 'tshang rgya bas sangs rgyas kyi 'phrin las mdzad de/ 'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi 'phrin las lnga pa'o/ /sangs rgyas bcom
ldan 'das rnams kyi chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba mdzad pa phyir mi ldog pa'i tshul gyis phyir mi ldog pa'i 'khor lo dang / 'jig rten thams cad kyis khong du chud par 'gyur ba'i tshul gyis
tshad med pa'i 'khor lo dang / mi 'jigs pa'i seng+ge'i nga ro chen po'i tshul gyis thams cad ma lus par mngon par sangs rgyas pa'i 'khor lo dang / chos kyi mdzod mun pa med pa'i
sgos snang bar byed pa'i tshul gyis chos thams cad mkhyen pa'i mdzod kyi 'khor lo dang / ye shes nam mkha'i dbyings ltar tshad med pa'i tshul gyis chags pa
med pa'i 'khor lo dang / chos thams cad kyi dngos po med pa'i rang bzhin rab tu rtogs par bya ba'i tshul gyis bsgribs pa med pa'i 'khor lo dang / sems can thams cad kyi chos kyi
mig rnam par sbyong ba'i tshul gyis 'jig rten thams cad kyi sgron ma'i 'khor lo dang / 'jig rten thams cad du rgyas par 'gengs pa'i tshul gyis thams cad mkhyen pa'i chos brjod
pa'i 'khor lo dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad dang mi 'gal ba'i tshul gyis/ sangs rgyas thams cad 'dab 'dres par gyur pa'i 'khor lo dang / de dag la sogs pa rnam
pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bas sems can thams cad kyi sems dang spyod pa'i rnam pa la chos kyi 'khor lo bskor te/ de ltar chos kyi 'khor lo bskor
bas kyang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams sangs rgyas kyi 'phrin las bsam gyis mi khyab pa mdzad de/ 'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams sangs rgyas kyi 'phrin
las drug pa'o/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni/ grong dang / grong khyer dang / grong rdal dang / rgyal po'i gnas su gshegs pas kyang sems can rnams la sangs rgyas
kyi 'phrin las mdzad de/ mi'i rgyal po'i gnas dang / lha'i rgyal po'i gnas dang / klu'i rgyal po'i gnas dang / gnod sbyin gyi rgyal po'i gnas dang / dri za'i rgyal po'i gnas dang /
lha ma yin gyi rgyal po'i gnas dang / nam mkha' lding gi rgyal po'i gnas dang / mi'am ci'i rgyal po'i gnas dang / lto 'phye chen po'i rgyal po'i gnas dang / srin po'i rgyal po'i gnas
dang | sha za'i rgyal po'i gnas dag tu gshegs pas kyang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni sangs rgyas kyi 'phrin las mdzad de/ 'di lta ste/ grong khyer gyi khrod byon na/ sa
g.yo ba dang / 'od zer snang ba dang / long ba rnams mig 'thob pa dang / 'on pa rnams sgra thos par 'gyur ba dang / smyos pa rnams dran pa 'thob par 'gyur ba dang / gos med pa
rnams gos 'thob par 'gyur ba dang / sdug bsngal ba rnams bde ba 'thob pa dang / rol mo'i cha spyad ma dkrol ma brdungs par sgra yid du 'ong ba rang 'byin pa dang / rgyan snod na 'dug
pa dang / gnas nas ma phog pa dang / ma bskyod ma dkrol bar bskyod cing dkrol ba'i sgra 'byung ba dang / bya sna tshogs mang po'i sgra skad yid du 'ong ba 'byung ba dang / blta na gtang mi bra
zhing mi mthun pa med pa'i sku mthong bas kyang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams sems can rnams la sangs rgyas kyi 'phrin las mdzad do/ /mtshan dang dpe byad bzang po bstan
pas kyang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams sems can rnams la sangs rgyas kyi 'phrin las mdzad de/ yongs su gzigs pa dang / rnam par gzigs
pa dang / brkyang ba dang bskum pas kyang sems can rnams la sangs rgyas kyi 'phrin las mdzad do/ /gshegs pa dang / slar bzhud pa dang / bzhengs pa dang / 'chag pa dang /
bzhugs pa dang / gzims pas kyang sems can rnams la sangs rgyas kyi 'phrin las mdzad do/ /chos bstan pa dang / mi gsung bar bzhugs pas kyang sems can rnams la
sangs rgyas kyi 'phrin las mdzad do/ /rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul dang / yongs su bstan pa'i cho 'phrul dang / rjes su bstan pa'i cho 'phrul gyis kyang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
rnams 'jig rten gyi khams kyi yul sems can bsam pa sna tshogs rgya mtsho dang ldan pa/ 'jig rten gyi spyod pa thams cad rgyu zhing 'byung ba dang ldan pa/ dge ba'i rtsa ba chen
pos shin tu bstan pa/ sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa dang ldan pa/ sngon 'grogs 'grogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' dang gnas pa'i sems can rnams la sangs rgyas kyi 'phrin
las mdzad do/ /yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams ni sku gzugs blta na mi ngoms pa'o zhes bya bar gzhol ba dang / sangs rgyas rnams skye bar dkon no zhes bya bar
yid ches par byed pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa mthong zhing / de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung thos pa ni bsod nams kyi chos dkar po'i 'byung gnas su gyur pa'o zhes sangs rgyas kyi
spyod pa yid la byed pa dang / 'jig rten thams cad rnam par dag pa ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa skye ba yin no zhes bya bar khong du chud par byed pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi yon tan bsngags pa ni
mtha' yas pa'o zhes bya bar yang dag par lta ba dang / ma byon pa'i sangs rgyas 'byung ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs yang dag par sgrub pa dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba dang / mos pa'i tshul
thams cad kyis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams mnyes par byed pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa rnams ni yon tan mtha' yas pa'o zhes khong du chud par byed pa dang / de bzhin
gshegs pa ni sems can thams cad la mngon du gyur par rtog pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa ni sems can gyi rigs bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i gnas su gyur bar sems pa dang /
de bzhin gshegs pa ni zhing thams cad na snang bar khong du chud pa dang / de lta bu'i dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad 'byung bas/ 'jig rten thams cad na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
rnams sems can rnams la sangs rgyas kyi 'phrin las mdzad do/ /dad par byas pa dang / phyag 'tshal ba dang / thal mo sbyar ba byas pa dang / rjes su bstod pa dang / spyan drangs pa dang /
mchod pa dang / mngon du mthong ba dang / 'dzum pa byas pa dang / sangs rgyas la dga' ba'i sems kyis mos par bya ba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba'i sgo nas kyang
sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni sems can rnams la sangs rgyas kyi 'phrin las mdzad do/ /sangs rgyas rjes su dran par gyur pas kyang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
