chub sems dpa' rnams mngon par 'byung ba dang / 'phags pa dang mthun pa'i lam gyis legs pa yongs su bstan pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams mngon
par 'byung ba dang / rab tu byung ba'i yon tan dang legs pa yang dag par bsngags pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams mngon par 'byung ba dang / mtha' gnyis
kyi lta ba dang bral ba yang dag par bstan pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams mngon par 'byung ba dang / 'dod pa'i bde ba dang phrad par brtson zhing bdag gi bde ba lhur len pa'i sems can
skyo bar bya ba'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams mngon par 'byung ba dang / khams gsum pa thams cad las 'byung ba'i sngon gyi ltas yang dag par bstan pa'i phyir/ byang chub
sems dpa' rnams mngon par 'byung ba dang / rang la rag las par spyod cing / gzhan gyi dring mi 'jog pa la brten pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams mngon par 'byung
ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi bsnyengs pa thob pa dang mthun par yang dag par bstan pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams mngon par 'byung ba dang / kye
rgyal ba'i sras/ chos nyid kyis kyang byang chub sems dpa' srid pa'i tha ma pa ni gdon mi za bar mngon par 'byung ste/ kye rgyal ba'i sras/ bcu po de dag ni/ byang chub sems dpa'
rnams sems can 'dul ba'i dbang gi phyir/ /mngon par 'byung ba yongs su ston pa dag go/ kye rgyal ba'i sras/ bcu po 'di dag ni/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi dka' ba
spyod pa'i sbyor ba ste/ bcu gang zhe na/ 'di ltar dma' ba la mos pa'i sems can gyi khams yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams dka' ba spyod pa ston
pa dang / lta ba'i rnam pa la gnas pa'i sems can rnams gyen du bskyod pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams dka' ba spyod pa ston pa dang / las dang bya
bas 'khyams par gyur pa'i sems can rnams la las kyi rnam par smin pa mngon sum du bstan pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams dka' ba spyod pa ston pa dang / kun
nas nyon mongs pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'byams klas par chos nyid rjes su 'brang bar bya ba'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams dka' ba spyod pa ston pa dang / bdag gi
dub pa nye bar zhi zhing mthu dang ldan pa yongs su bstan pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams dka' ba spyod pa ston pa dang / ma yin na chos la chags pa rnams kyi don du
byang chub sems dpa' rnams dka' ba spyod pa ston pa dang / 'dod pa'i bde ba dang phrad par brtson zhing rang gi bde ba lhur len pa'i sems can rnams skyo bar bya ba'i phyir/
byang chub sems dpa' rnams dka' ba spyod pa ston pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa brtsams pa'i khyad par yongs su bstan pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams
dka' ba spyod pa ston pa dang / skye bo phyi ma rnams brtson 'grus rtsom pa la yang dag par sbyar ba'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams dka' ba spyod pa ston pa dang / ma yin

na dbang po yongs su ma smin pa'i lha dang mi rnams yongs su smin par bya ba'i dus bsdad pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams dka' ba spyod pa ston pa'o/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras/ bcu po de dag ni/ byang
chub sems dpa' rnams sems can 'dul ba'i dbang gi phyir/ dka' ba spyod pa'i sbyor ba yongs su ston pa dag go/ kye rgyal ba'i sras/ bcu po 'di dag ni/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi snying
po byang chub tu 'gro ba ste/ bcu gang zhe na/ 'di ltar 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad snang bar bya ba'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams snying po byang chub tu 'dod pa dang / 'jig rten gyi khams
thams cad rab tu bskyod pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams snying po byang chub tu 'dong ba dang / 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du bdag gi lus rnam par phye ba yongs su bstan pa'i phyir/
byang chub sems dpa' rnams snying po byang chub tu 'dod pa dang / sngon lhan cig tu spyod spyod pa'i grogs kyi byang chub sems dpa' rnams bskul ba'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams snying
po byang chub tu 'dong ba dang / snying po byang chub kyi rgyan rnam par phye ba yongs su bstan pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams snying po byang chub tu 'dong ba dang / sems can ji ltar mos pa
rnams la lus dang / spyod lam dang / byang chub kyi shing gi rgyan rnam par phye ba yongs su bstan pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams snying po byang chub tu 'dong ba dang / 'jig rten gyi khams
thams cad na bzhugs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mngon du blta ba'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams snying po byang chub tu 'dong ba dang / gom pa dor ba
dang | gdeg pa thams cad du ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo la snyoms par 'jug cing / skad cig skad cig tu rnam par 'tshang rgya ba las mi 'da' ba'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams snying po byang

chub tu 'dong ba dang / lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang / 'jig rten
gyi mgon po thams cad kyi mchod pa blang ba'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams snying po byang chub tu 'dong ba dang / chags pa med pa'i ye shes chen pos rnam par phye ba'i byang chub
sems dpa'i spyod pa spyad pas/ 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad rnam par blta ba'i phyir/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad yid la byed cing / phyogs thams cad du rnam par phye
ba'i mngon par rdzogs pa'i byang chub yongs su bstan pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi snying po byang chub tu 'dong ba'o/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras/ bcu po de dag ni/ byang chub
sems dpa' rnams kyi snying po byang chub tu 'gro ba sems can 'dul ba'i dbang gi phyir yongs su bstan pa dag go/ //
